explains: adj. 盈利的，有利可图的；有益的，有用的

sentences.en: Other less profitable services are to be axed later this year.
sentences.cn: 其他盈利较少的服务项目预定今年稍晚将大量削减。

sentences.en: Drug manufacturing is the most profitable business in the U.S.
sentences.cn: 药品生产是美国最赚钱的行业。

sentences.en: For us, saving energy has been very, very profitable.
sentences.cn: 对我们来说，节约能源是非常非常有益的。
